General.Name: Asuransi Jasa Tania Tbk
General.Description: PT Asuransi Jasa Tania Tbk provides general insurance products and services in Indonesia. The company offers fire insurance products, including property all risk/industrial all risk and earthquake insurance products; engineering insurance products, such as contractor all risk, erection all risk, and machinery breakdown insurance products; and surety bond insurance products comprising bid, performance, advance payment, and maintenance bond insurance products. It also provides property, motor vehicle, marine cargo and hull, liability, goods transportation, personal accident, and health insurance products, as well as miscellaneous insurance products, including cash in transit/cash in safe, heavy equipment, burglary/theft, and hole in one insurance products. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Asuransi Jasa Tania Tbk is a subsidiary of Dana Pensiun Perkebunan.
General.Address: Agro Plaza Building, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12950
